projects.title: DuskBunnies
projects.description: DuskBunnies was an uncompleted videogame project. It was a 2D Platformer, using sprites and art from [Andrew Chason](http://www.andrewchasondesign.com/).

projects.title: Jam.Ar
projects.description: Jam.Ar was a 48hs Game Jam organized by me and Bruno Martinez in La Plata, Buenos Aires, Argentina.

skills.name: Unit Testing
skills.notes: Always trying to enforcing it. Implemented it into monolithic projects
